incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays From Twilio Short-Code Numbers to Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body:
Due to sustained high traffic on the Small US carrier networks, we are currently experiencing SMS delivery delays from Twilio Short-Code numbers. Messages are queued due to capacity shortage, and customers may see delays when sending to certain US carriers.
Please find the current delivery status for the major carriers below:
For US Networks, use the following:
AT&T (status - Operational)
T-Mobile (status -  Operational)
Verizon (status -  Operational)
MetroPCS (status -  Operational)
US Cellular (status -  Operational)
Altice (status -  Delayed)
We are actively working with our carrier partners to resolve the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as we have any new information to share.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incidents.name: 500 Errors in Programmable Messaging API

incident_updates.body: Twilio Programmable Messaging API was degraded for 5 minutes between 06:03 and 06:08 Pacific Time on 12/02/2024. During this period of time, customers sending messages may have received 5xx's in API responses. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Programmable Messaging API. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: Twilio Messaging Callback was degraded for 18 minutes between 10:04 am and 10:22 am Pacific Time on 11/29/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced status callbacks failures. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Status Callbacks. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

Also, we have mitigated issues with the outbound traffic in SMS delivery delays to multiple networks in Hungry via domestic sender ID. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
